Text: Just need one seeder to get that last little bit, its almost done!  Come on, turn me into a seeder!

Ok.  IF you have downloaded it to the max limit (97,8 % or around) you are able to watch the movie STILL! Only with a few lags once a while ( on around 1-2 secs) due to the lack of vedio data.
Load the following files in this order: VTS_01_1 then VTS_01_2 and lastly VTS_01_3.

You can play the file in VLC mediaplayer, and adjust the language between English, Portogues (I think) and a 3rd language, by using the shortcut key inside VLC, 'L'.

Enjoy the movie :) 

Ps. EXTREAMLY GOOD QUALITY!
